PCY-P-PLATFORM-OPENSHIFT-ADMINS.name: pcy-p-platform-openshift-admins
statements: Allow group grp-lzp-p-platform-openshift-admins to read all-resources in compartment cmp-landingzone-p:cmp-lzp-prod:cmp-lzp-p-platform:cmp-lzp-p-platform-openshift
